posts.post_title: For Sale T206 PSA 6 Hemphill and Warhop SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello,
I have the following cards for sale. PSA 6 Charlie Hemphill Piedmont 350 SOLD. Also, a  PSA 6 Sweet Caporal 350 Jack Warhop SOLD. Shipping and insurance is included. Paypal preferred. Will take SOLD for both. Contact me if you have any comments, questions or concerns.
Thanks,
David
